p2: Decoder untuk SSL/TLS certificate yang extract informasi dari certificate file. Paste certificate content atau upload .cer/.pem file dan tool menampilkan detail seperti issuer, subject, validity date, public key, dan extension. Berguna untuk verify certificate configuration, troubleshoot SSL issue, dan audit certificate expiration. Support X.509 certificate format.
p3: System administrator menggunakan decoder untuk verify certificate properly configured dan valid. DevOps engineer menggunakan untuk certificate expiration monitoring dan renewal scheduling. Security auditor menggunakan untuk assess certificate strength dan configuration compliance. Support engineer menggunakan untuk debug SSL/TLS connection problem dengan client certificate.
p4: Check certificate validity date regular dan plan renewal sebelum expiration untuk avoid service disruption. Certificate chain harus complete: leaf certificate, intermediate, dan root untuk proper validation. Self-signed certificate acceptable untuk internal testing tapi require proper CA certificate untuk production. Pin certificate public key untuk additional security terhadap compromise CA atau man-in-the-middle attack.
p5: The decoder parses PEM format by stripping the header/footer lines and base64-decoding the content to obtain raw DER bytes. DER parsing follows ASN.1 encoding rules to extract tag-length-value structures. The certificate structure is parsed according to the X.509 v3 specification with fields like issuer, subject (Distinguished Names), validity (UTCTime or GeneralizedTime), and extensions. Subject Alternative Names are extracted from the v3 extensions field. Public key information includes algorithm identifier (RSA, ECDSA) and key size in bits. All date/time values are converted from ASN.1 time formats to human-readable strings.
